org.eclipse.scada.sec.provider.plain.property

Class PropertyAuthenticationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.scada.sec.authn.AbstractPlainAuthenticationService
      • org.eclipse.scada.sec.provider.plain.property.PropertyAuthenticationService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthenticationService

    public class PropertyAuthenticationService
extends AbstractPlainAuthenticationService
    A plain authentication provider

    Authentication data is stored in the following from in the system property org.eclipse.scada.sec.provider.plain.property.data: username:password:ROLE1,ROLE2|username2:password2:ROLE1,ROLE2

    Since:
    0.1.0
